Class Tile

java.lang.Object
com.example.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Tile extends Object implements Serializable
A class responsible for storing the tiles

      public Tile(String name, int price, int houseCost, int tax, int numberOfHouses, String color, int purchasable, int housePurchasable)
      Constructor for the Tile class
      Parameters:
      name - - namem of the tile
      price - - price of the tile
      houseCost - - cost of a house on the tile
      tax - - tax of the tile
      numberOfHouses - - number of houses on the tile
      color - - color of the tile
      purchasable - - whether the tile is purchasable
      housePurchasable - - whether houses can be purchased on the tile
